static void __cvmx_gpio_interrupt_clear ( uint8_t  node,
uint64_t  clear_mask 
) [inline, static]

Clear the interrupt rising edge detector for the supplied pins in the mask.

Chips which have more than 16 GPIO pins can't use them for interrupts.

Parameters:
node Node to clear
clear_mask Mask of pins to clear

static void cvmx_gpio_set_freq ( int  node,
unsigned int  timer,
uint64_t  freq_in_hz 
) [inline, static]

Configures a GPIO timer for the specified frequency.

Parameters:
node Node to set the GPIO timer on
timer Timer number, 0-3 or 0x100-0x103 for node 1.
freq_in_hz Frequency to toggle the GPIO line. Set to 0 to disable the timer.
